name: Santa's Helper (leapingleo)
description:
*******THIS IS A VR GAME REQUIRES OCULUS HEADSET********

You'll have to sideload it to your headset.

Tutorial: https://oneirosvr.com/how-to-sideload-apps-on-oculus-quest-oculus-go

Game Description:

Santa cannot deliver presents this Christmas somehow. Ride the sleigh and get presents delivered under the Christmas trees! After the job's done, take your time exploring the cosy villages that are full of vibrant lights and Christmas settings!

Question is though, should they all be getting presents?
